metadata.name: Memento
metadata.description:
"An eye, a woman, the concept of freedom.
This work investigates the fleeting nature of independence and living free.
Choices, rights and revolutions are represented under the distracted gaze of society."

Created for Art Innovation Gallery on the occasion of the exhibition "The Sound Of Pixels" in Hong Kong during Art Basel 2023.

This important work was originally conceptualized and created by Lele Gastini who, for the occasion, collaborated with fellow musician and composer Diego Ratto (TTØRA).

Donna, vita, libertà
